original_text: But of their children, who were left after them in the land, whom the children of Israel consumed not, them did Solomon make to pay tribute until this day.
korean_text: 곧 이스라엘 자손이 다 멸하지 않았으므로 그 땅에 남아 있는 그들의 자손들을 솔로몬이 역꾼으로 삼아 오늘에 이르렀으되

sentences.original_text: who were left after them in the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 후에 그 땅에 남아있던 자들

sentences.original_text: whom the children of Israel consumed not
them did Solomon make to pay tribute
